statements: DELETE FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE user_id = 'af5c8c2b-5d44-4b12-9509-233705a1b618' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 100 AND alert_id = 50;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND alert_id = 50;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_time < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000);
